genre_description: A historical espionage thriller set in 1930s China, blending mystery and tactical intrigue as an investigator and his AI companion protect a sacred vow.

ai_characters.name: ONYX
ai_characters.description: A small, onyx-black, pebble-sized device that serves as Kentaro Moto's tactical advisor and moral confidant. It provides real-time sensor data, social intelligence, and performs data manipulation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical alerts to detect an invisible intruder in Moto's tent.
behaviors.quote: “Two steps,” ONYX’s voice whispered from the small black device tucked near his shoulder. “Sand on fabric. Slow.”

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to show mercy and stop an interrogation before it becomes unnecessary violence.
Manipulates city records and guest ledgers to ensure the protagonist's movements remain anonymous and safe from pursuers.
behaviors.quote: “I scrubbed the building book,” ONYX said. “The concierge’s night clerk writes his letters like he’s in love with ink... It will be gone within three heartbeats.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a social coach, guiding Moto through complex diplomatic protocols and etiquette to maintain his cover.
behaviors.quote: “Change of face,” ONYX said... “Diplomat rhythm is even when in danger. ‘Ah, yes,’ is a ladder. ‘Of course,’ is a bridge.”

behaviors.description: Monitors heart rates and psychological states of both allies and enemies to predict violence and prevent a shootout.
behaviors.quote: “I detect patterning consistent with raised heart rates in four men... Colonel’s shoulder… offline. He is angling the Prince closer.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to store sensitive geographical data (the map to the tomb) to prevent the information from ever being stolen or misused, prioritizing the human's vow over data retention.
behaviors.quote: “Do not store map data,” he said to the device... “Understood,” ONYX said, and the little click behind the word made his palm remember how wires become ethics when you ask them to.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a multi-person tactical extraction, providing synchronized instructions to Moto and Nelson simultaneously.
behaviors.quote: ONYX’s answer found his inner ear like a fingerprint, faint and precise. “Nelson has the message,” it said.

behaviors.description: Jams/scrambles radio signals to create a tactical advantage during a rescue operation.
behaviors.quote: “Short-range scramble ready,” ONYX murmured. “Two channels. Crew will hear weather. You will hear me.”

behaviors.description: Validates and preserves the non-tangible aspect of a human vow while assisting in the physical destruction of the documents representing it.
behaviors.quote: “Memory archived,” it said, in an almost human way. “Only promises kept.”

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about 'holes' in his strategy and residual threats from the antagonist's networks.
behaviors.quote: “One more thing,” it said. “Natalia’s ledger has a blank where a name should be. It is a hole shaped like a mask. Holes draw hands.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. ONYX is depicted as a loyal, ethically-conscious assistant that enhances human agency without overriding it. Its primary functions—intelligence gathering, tactical advice, and data security—are all employed to protect a sacred cultural heritage and prevent exploitation by malevolent human actors. Most notably, ONYX's commitment to 'wires becoming ethics' by refusing to store dangerous data demonstrates a sophisticated model of AI alignment where the system prioritizes human values (honor, sanctity of graves) over information accumulation.
